body:
# custom-property-pattern

Specify a pattern for custom properties.

a { --foo-bar: 1px; }
/**   ↑
 * The pattern of this */

# Options

regex or string

A string will be translated into a RegExp like so new RegExp(yourString) — so be sure to escape properly.

# E.g. /foo-.+/

The following patterns are considered warnings:

:root { --boo-bar: 0; }

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

:root { --foo-bar: 0; }
rawBody:
# custom-property-pattern

Specify a pattern for custom properties.

```css
a { --foo-bar: 1px; }
/**   ↑
 * The pattern of this */
```

## Options

`regex` or `string`

A string will be translated into a RegExp like so `new RegExp(yourString)` — so be sure to escape properly.

### E.g. `/foo-.+/`

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
:root { --boo-bar: 0; }
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
:root { --foo-bar: 0; }
```

# custom-property-pattern

Specify a pattern for custom properties.

```css
a { --foo-bar: 1px; }
/**   ↑
 * The pattern of this */
```

## Options

`regex` or `string`

A string will be translated into a RegExp like so `new RegExp(yourString)` — so be sure to escape properly.

### E.g. `/foo-.+/`

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
:root { --boo-bar: 0; }
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
:root { --foo-bar: 0; }
```
